content: व्यवस्था {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be placed asunder. {@--2@} To be arranged in due order. {@--3@} To be settled or fixed, become permanent, वचतीयमिदं व्यवस्थितं <ls>Ku. 4. 21.</ls> {@--4@} To rest or depend upon. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To place or rest upon, direct towards; <ls>Ku. 7. 75.</ls> {@--2@} To arrange, manage, adjust. {@--3@} To settle, resolve, decree. {@--4@} To separate, place apart. {@--5@} To do, perform. {@--6@} To lay down a rule or law, enact a law.

व्यवस्था {@--1@} Adjustment, arrangement, settlement; as in वर्णाश्रमव्यवस्था. {@--2@} Fixity, definiteness; <ls>R. 7. 54.</ls> {@--3@} Fixity, firm basis; आजहतुस्तच्चरणौ पृथिव्यां स्थलारविंदश्रियमव्यवस्थां <ls>Ku. 1. 33.</ls> {@--4@} Relative position. {@--5@} A settled rule, law, statute, decree, decision, legal opinion, written declaration of the law (especially on doubtful points or where contradictory texts have to be properly adjusted). {@--6@} An agreement, a contract. {@--7@} State, condition. {@--8@} State or order of things. {@--9@} Separation.
